item.description:
We'll begin our Columbus Day celebration at Joe's American Bar & Grill ( http://www.joesameric... ) It's a bustling waterfront restaurant bordering Christopher Columbus Park. The Aquarium T-stop is right nearby. They offer 10 brunch entrees including eggs, steak, French toast, pancakes and omelettes. Prices range from $10.99 to $17.75. All entrees include your choice of Bloody Mary, Mimosa, Glass of Champagne or Bud Light. After brunch, we'll enjoy live entertainment, offered until 4:00 in Columbus Park. ( http://www.foccp.org/... ) That will pause from approximately 1:30-2:30 as Boston's Columbus Day Parade passes the Park for our viewing. It should be a fun day.

Important: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines. Thank you.
item.name: Joe's- Brunch + Columbus Day Celebration
